title: Megamind
plot_simple: The supervillain Megamind finally defeats his nemesis, the superhero Metro Man. But without a hero, he loses all purpose and must find new meaning to his life.

title: Sunshine
plot_simple: A team of astronauts are sent to re-ignite the dying sun 50 years into the future.

title: Gone Baby Gone
plot_simple: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally. Based on the Dennis Lehane novel.

title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
plot_simple: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super-intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.

title: GoldenEye
plot_simple: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow agent believed to be dead.

title: Source Code
plot_simple: An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.

title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
plot_simple: Tucker & Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are attacked by a group of preppy college kids.

title: The Last King of Scotland
also_known_as: Der letzte König von Schottland - In den Fängen der Macht
plot_simple: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s

title: True Romance
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Clarence marries hooker Alabama, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood, while the owners of the coke try to reclaim it.

title: Army of Darkness
also_known_as: Army of Darkness: The Medieval Dead
plot_simple: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

title: Beauty and the Beast
filming_locations: Walt Disney Feature Animation - 500 S. Buena Vista Street, Burbank, California, USA
plot_simple: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
filming_locations: Albury Park, Guildford, Surrey, England, UK
plot_simple: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

title: Die Hard
filming_locations: 29th-35th Floors, Fox Plaza - 2121 Avenue of the Stars, Century City, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save wife Holly Gennaro and several others, taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: American History X
filming_locations: Johnie's Coffee Shop - 6101 Wilshire Boulevard, Fairfax, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

title: The Help
plot_simple: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African-American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

title: Metropolis
plot_simple: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.
runtime: USA: 123 min (2002 Murnau Foundation 75th aniversary restored version)
119 min (DVD edition) (2002 Murnau Foundation 75th aniversary restored version)

title: Unbreakable
filming_locations: Franklin Field - 235 S. 33rd Street, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA
plot_simple: A suspense thriller with supernatural overtones that revolves around a man who learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

title: Dirty Harry
filming_locations: Embassy Hotel, 610 Polk Street, San Francisco, California, USA
plot_simple: When a mad man calling himself 'the Scorpio Killer' menaces the city, tough as nails San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and ferret out the crazed psychopath.

title: Scream
filming_locations: Bradley Video, Santa Rosa, California, USA
plot_simple: A killer known as Ghostface begins killing off teenagers, and as the body count begins rising, one girl and her friends find themselves contemplating the "Rules" of horror films as they find themselves living in a real-life one.

title: The Descent
plot_simple: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

title: The Hangover
plot_simple: A Las Vegas-set comedy centered around three groomsmen who lose their about-to-be-wed buddy during their drunken misadventures, then must retrace their steps in order to find him.

title: Annie Hall
filming_locations: 2nd Avenue, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

title: Life of Brian
plot_simple: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

title: Superbad
filming_locations: California State University Northridge - 18111 Nordhoff Street, Northridge, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

title: Akira
plot_simple: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psionic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psionics can stop.

title: Moneyball
filming_locations: Blair Field, Recreation Park - 4700 E. 10th Street, Long Beach, California, USA
plot_simple: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to put together a baseball club on a budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

title: Spaceballs
plot_simple: Planet Spaceball's President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal Planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

title: Toy Story 2
plot_simple: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

title: The Shining
plot_simple: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

title: Spartacus
plot_simple: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

title: I Am Legend
also_known_as: I Am Legend: The IMAX Experience
filming_locations: Brooklyn Bridge, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

title: Chicken Run
plot_simple: Chicken Run is a comedy escape drama with a touch of passion set on a sinister Yorks chicken farm in 1950's England

title: The Graduate
filming_locations: 607 North Palm Drive, Beverly Hills, California, USA
plot_simple: Recent college graduate Benjamin Braddock is trapped into an affair with Mrs. Robinson, who happens to be the wife of his father's business partner and then finds himself falling in love with her daughter, Elaine.

title: Scent of a Woman
filming_locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
filming_locations: Camperdown Studios, Camperdown Road, Miramar, Wellington, New Zealand
plot_simple: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
also_known_as: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban: The IMAX Experience
filming_locations: 8 Stoney Street, Borough, London, England, UK
plot_simple: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
plot_simple: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

title: The Adventures of Tintin
also_known_as: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
plot_simple: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

title: Meet the Parents
also_known_as: Meine Braut, ihr Vater und ich
filming_locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

title: There Will Be Blood
plot_simple: A story about family, greed, religion, and oil, centered around a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: Stardust
plot_simple: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

title: Blazing Saddles
also_known_as: Mel Brooks' Blazing Saddles or Never Give a Saga an Even Break
plot_simple: To ruin a western town, a corrupt political boss appoints a black sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

title: Citizen Kane
filming_locations: New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

title: A Beautiful Mind
plot_simple: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.

title: The Rock
filming_locations: Alcatraz Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA
plot_simple: A renegade general and his group of U.S. Marines take over Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco Bay with biological weapons. A chemical weapons specialist and the only man to have ever escaped from the Rock attempt to prevent chaos.

title: Sleepers
filming_locations: Cafe Elysian - 1001 Washington Street, Hoboken, New Jersey, USA
plot_simple: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized; over 10 years later, they get their chance for revenge.

title: Young Frankenstein
filming_locations: Mayfair Theatre - 214 Santa Monica Boulevard, Santa Monica, California, USA
plot_simple: Dr. Frankenstein's grandson, after years of living down the family reputation, inherits granddad's castle and repeats the experiments.

title: Horrible Bosses
plot_simple: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

title: The Man from Earth
also_known_as: Jerome Bixby's The Man from Earth
filming_locations: Agua Dulce Movie Ranch - 34855 Petersen Road, Agua Dulce, California, USA
plot_simple: The movie begins with Professor John Oldman packing his belongings onto his truck, preparing to move to a new home.

title: Das Leben der Anderen
plot_simple: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: The Negotiator
filming_locations: 77 W. Wacker Drive, Downtown, Chicago, Illinois, USA
plot_simple: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: Minority Report
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

title: The Last Samurai
plot_simple: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

title: The Deer Hunter
plot_simple: An in-depth examination of the way that the Vietnam war affects the lives of people in a small industrial town in the USA.

title: Gangs of New York
filming_locations: Cinecittà Studios, Cinecittà, Rome, Lazio, Italy
plot_simple: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

title: Ghost World
plot_simple: Enid and Rebecca are social outsiders who, after graduating from high school, play a mean prank on a middle-aged geek.

title: A Serious Man
filming_locations: Uptown Vision Clinic, Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA
plot_simple: A black comedy drama centered on Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern professor who watches his life unravel through multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking for meaning and answers he seems to stay stalled.

title: The Others
plot_simple: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.

title: Shrek 2
plot_simple: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

title: The Wizard of Oz
plot_simple: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

title: Home Alone
plot_simple: An 8-year-old boy, who is accidentally left behind while his family flies to France for Christmas, has to defend his home against idiotic burglars.

title: Dr. No
plot_simple: James Bond's investigation of a missing colleague in Jamaica leads him to the island of the mysterious Dr. No and a scheme to end the US space program.

title: The Hurt Locker
plot_simple: Forced to play a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse in the chaos of war, an elite Army bomb squad unit must come together in a city where everyone is a potential enemy and every object could be a deadly bomb.

title: Das Boot
plot_simple: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
filming_locations: 1613 Carlisle Drive East, Mobile, Alabama, USA
plot_simple: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

title: The Sound of Music
also_known_as: Rodgers and Hammerstein's The Sound of Music
plot_simple: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

title: The Game
filming_locations: 1 Bush Street, San Francisco, California, USA
plot_simple: Wealthy financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.

title: Predator
plot_simple: A team of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.

title: Vertigo
filming_locations: 1000 Mason Street, North Beach, San Francisco, California, USA
plot_simple: A retired San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's much-younger wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

title: Iron Man
filming_locations: Palmdale Regional Airport, Palmdale, California, USA
plot_simple: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
plot_simple: A sleazy defense attorney has a crisis of conscience when he represents a wealthy client who has a foolproof plan to beat the system.

title: Black Hawk Down
plot_simple: 123 elite U.S. soldiers drop into Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.

title: The Town
plot_simple: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the FBI agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

title: Psycho
filming_locations: 4270 Lankershim Boulevard, North Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A young woman steals $40,000 from her employer's client, and subsequently encounters a young motel proprietor too long under the domination of his mother.

title: Cinderella Man
plot_simple: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

title: Easy A
plot_simple: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

title: Sunset Blvd.
filming_locations: Alto-Nido Apartments -1851 N. Ivar Street, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.

title: 28 Weeks Later
filming_locations: Aldwych Underground Station, Aldwych, Holborn, London, England, UK
plot_simple: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes to plan.

title: A Walk to Remember
plot_simple: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

title: Double Indemnity
filming_locations: 1825 N. Kingsley Drive, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: An insurance rep lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
plot_simple: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.

title: The Ghost Writer
plot_simple: A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British prime minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

title: Trading Places
filming_locations: The New York Chamber of Commerce Building - The Great Hall, 65 Liberty Street, New York, New York, USA
plot_simple: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

title: The Ides of March
plot_simple: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

title: Billy Elliot
filming_locations: Canary Wharf Underground Station, Canary Wharf, Isle of Dogs, London, England, UK
plot_simple: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

title: Kingdom of Heaven
plot_simple: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
also_known_as: The Matrix Reloaded: The IMAX Experience
plot_simple: Neo and the rebel leaders estimate that they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. During this, Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.

title: We Were Soldiers
filming_locations: Castle Green Apartments - 99 S. Raymond, Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.

title: Death at a Funeral
filming_locations: Chenies Manor House, Chenies, Buckinghamshire, England, UK
plot_simple: Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.

title: Alien
filming_locations: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK
plot_simple: The crew of a commercial deep space mining ship, investigating a suspected S.O.S., lands on a distant planet and discovers a nest of strange eggs.

title: El secreto de sus ojos
plot_simple: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: The Insider
plot_simple: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

title: The Illusionist
plot_simple: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

title: Chinatown
filming_locations: 1315 South El Molino Drive, South Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: A private detective investigating an adultery case stumbles on to a scheme of murder that has something to do with water.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
plot_simple: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.

title: Yip Man
plot_simple: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun.

title: Leaving Las Vegas
filming_locations: Bally's Casino Resort - 3645 Las Vegas Boulevard South, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA
plot_simple: Ben Sanderson, an alcoholic Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his drinking, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

title: Avatar
plot_simple: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: The Fighter
plot_simple: A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.

title: About Schmidt
plot_simple: A man upon retirement embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.

title: Det sjunde inseglet
plot_simple: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: The Incredibles
plot_simple: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: Man on Fire
plot_simple: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: Apocalypse Now
plot_simple: During the U.S.-Viet Nam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

title: Syriana
plot_simple: A politically-charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved and affected by it.

title: Being John Malkovich
also_known_as: Dans la peau de John Malkovich
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of the movie star, John Malkovich.

title: The Thin Red Line
plot_simple: Director Terrence Malick's adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
filming_locations: Courthouse Square, Backlot, Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
plot_simple: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

title: Inception
filming_locations: 1240 S Hope St, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: In a world where technology exists to enter the human mind through dream invasion, a highly skilled thief is given a final chance at redemption which involves executing his toughest job to date: Inception.

title: The Usual Suspects
filming_locations: City Hall - 200 N. Spring Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: The Great Escape

plot_simple: Allied POWs plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

title: Capote
plot_simple: Truman Capote, during his research for his book In Cold Blood, an account of the murder of a Kansas family, the writer develops a close relationship with Perry Smith, one of the killers.

title: Lost in Translation
plot_simple: A fading movie star with a sense of emptiness, and a neglected young wife meet as strangers in Tokyo and form an unlikely bond.

title: Platoon
plot_simple: A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

title: Casino Royale
plot_simple: In his first mission as 007, James Bond must win a poker game at The Casino Royale, in Montenegro, to stop a criminal who works as a banker to the terrorist organizations of the world, from financing crime and terrorism across the globe.

title: Star Trek
plot_simple: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
also_known_as: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs: An IMAX 3D Experience
plot_simple: The most delicious event since macaroni met cheese. Inspired by the beloved children's book, the film focuses on a town where food falls from the sky like rain.

title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
filming_locations: 12016 Moorpark Street, Studio City, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

title: Men in Black 3

plot_simple: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

title: The Lion King
plot_simple: Tricked into thinking he killed his father, a guilt ridden lion cub flees into exile and abandons his identity as the future King.

title: Changeling

plot_simple: A grief-stricken mother takes on the LAPD to her own detriment when it stubbornly tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child, while also refusing to give up hope that she will find him one day.

title: Big Fish
plot_simple: A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.

title: Paths of Glory
plot_simple: When soldiers in WW1 refuse to continue with an impossible attack, their superiors decide to make an example of them.

title: Diarios de motocicleta
plot_simple: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

title: Bridge to Terabithia
plot_simple: A preteen's life is changed after befriending the new girl at school.

title: Dazed and Confused
plot_simple: The adventures of incoming high school and junior high students on the last day of school, in May of 1976.

title: Modern Times
plot_simple: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: Night of the Living Dead
also_known_as: George A. Romero's Night of the Living Dead
filming_locations: Basement, Latent Image - Carson Street, South Side, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA
plot_simple: A group of people hide from bloodthirsty zombies in a farmhouse.

title: Cars
plot_simple: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

title: Magnolia
plot_simple: An epic mosaic of several interrelated characters in search of happiness, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
plot_simple: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

title: Batoru rowaiaru

title: The Abyss

plot_simple: A civilian diving team are enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

title: 25th Hour
plot_simple: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

title: Beetle Juice

plot_simple: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

title: Galaxy Quest
filming_locations: Culver Studios - 9336 W. Washington Blvd., Culver City, California, USA
plot_simple: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

title: Gone with the Wind
also_known_as: Lo que el viento se llevó

title: The Adjustment Bureau
filming_locations: Statue of Liberty, Liberty Island, New York Harbor, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: The affair between a politician and a ballerina is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

title: Highlander
filming_locations: The Storr, Isle of Skye, Highland, Scotland, UK
plot_simple: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

title: First Blood

plot_simple: A Vietnam Veteran uses his combat skills against the lawman of a small town when he arrests and abuses him.

title: Lethal Weapon
filming_locations: 2817 Via Segovia, Palos Verdes Peninsula, California, USA
plot_simple: A veteran cop, Murtaugh, is partnered with a young suicidal cop, Riggs. Both having one thing in common; hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

title: Death Proof
plot_simple: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

title: Rocky Balboa

plot_simple: Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement to step into the ring for the last time and face the heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

title: Dark City
filming_locations: Fox Studios, Moore Park, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
plot_simple: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun and run by beings with telekinetic powers who seek the souls of humans.

title: Stranger Than Fiction
filming_locations: 25th Street & Christiana Avenue, South Lawndale, Chicago, Illinois, USA
plot_simple: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
also_known_as: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire: The IMAX Experience
filming_locations: Ashridge Park, Little Gaddesden, Hertfordshire, England, UK
plot_simple: Harry finds himself selected as an underaged competitor in a dangerous multi-wizardary school competition.

title: Dawn of the Dead
plot_simple: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman, and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot_simple: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

title: Batman
filming_locations: Acton Lane Power Station, Acton Lane, Acton, London, England, UK
plot_simple: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

title: Speed
filming_locations: Ballerina Clown - 255 Main Street, Venice, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: Enemy of the State
plot_simple: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

title: Grindhouse
filming_locations: Austin Studios - 1901 E. 51st Street, Austin, Texas, USA
plot_simple: Two full length feature horror movies written by Quentin Tarantino & Robert Rodriguez put together as a two film feature. Including fake movie trailers in between both movies.

title: Midnight in Paris
filming_locations: Arc de Triomphe, Paris 8, Paris, France
plot_simple: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancé's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

title: Ratatouille
plot_simple: Remy is a young rat in the French countryside who arrives in Paris, only to find out that his cooking idol is dead. When he makes an unusual alliance with a restaurant's new garbage boy, the culinary and personal adventures begin despite Remy's family's skepticism and the rat-hating world of humans.

title: American Gangster
plot_simple: In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.

title: Lars and the Real Girl
plot_simple: A delusional young guy strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

title: Michael Clayton
filming_locations: 1345 Ave of the Americas, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multi-billion dollar class action suit.

title: The Goonies
plot_simple: A group of kids embark on a wild adventure after finding a pirate treasure map.

title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
filming_locations: Cinecittà Studios, Cinecittà, Rome, Lazio, Italy
plot_simple: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

title: Layer Cake
filming_locations: Newport Pagnell Service Area, M1 Motorway, Newport Pagnell, Buckinghamshire, England, UK
plot_simple: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

title: Reservoir Dogs
filming_locations: 5860 North Figueroa Street, Highland Park, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Love Actually
plot_simple: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely and interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

title: Apocalypto
plot_simple: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

title: Adaptation.
filming_locations: Los Angeles Center Studios - 450 S. Bixel Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A lovelorn screenwriter turns to his less talented twin brother for help when his efforts to adapt a non-fiction book go nowhere.

title: Rescue Dawn
plot_simple: A US Fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

title: The Kingdom
plot_simple: A team of U.S. government agents is sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

title: Wo hu cang long
plot_simple: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically-skilled, teenage nobleman's daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.

title: Planet Terror
also_known_as: Grindhouse Presents: Robert Rodriguez's Planet Terror
plot_simple: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

title: The Breakfast Club
plot_simple: Five high school students, all different stereotypes, meet in detention, where they pour their hearts out to each other, and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

title: Brokeback Mountain
plot_simple: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.

title: The Princess Bride
plot_simple: A classic fairy tale, with swordplay, giants, an evil prince, a beautiful princess, and yes, some kissing (as read by a kindly grandfather).

title: American Psycho
filming_locations: Boston Club - 4 Front Street East, Toronto, Ontario, Canada
plot_simple: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he escalates deeper into his illogical, gratuitous fantasies.

title: Jerry Maguire
plot_simple: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent with the only athlete who stays with him.

title: Tropic Thunder
also_known_as: Tropic Thunder - Hol Dir die volle Dröhnung!
plot_simple: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

title: Almost Famous
also_known_as: Untitled: Almost Famous the Bootleg Cut
filming_locations: 1047 Maple St, Santa Monica, California, USA
plot_simple: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

title: The Apartment
filming_locations: 205 Columbus Avenue, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

title: Shrek
plot_simple: An ogre, in order to regain his swamp, travels along with an annoying donkey in order to bring a princess to a scheming lord, wishing himself King.

title: Trainspotting
filming_locations: 78A Talgarth Road, West Kensington, London, England, UK
plot_simple: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: Apollo 13
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Three astronauts must devise a strategy to return to Earth safely after their spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage.

title: Up
plot_simple: By tying thousands of balloons to his home, 78-year-old Carl sets out to fulfill his lifelong dream to see the wilds of South America. Russell, a wilderness explorer 70 years younger, inadvertently becomes a stowaway.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
plot_simple: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

title: Rango
plot_simple: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
plot_simple: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

title: The Hunger Games
plot_simple: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to compete.

title: Monsters, Inc.
plot_simple: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.

title: Inside Man
filming_locations: Brooklyn Bridge, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A cop has to talk down a bank robber after the criminal's perfect heist spirals into a hostage situation.

title: Phone Booth
plot_simple: Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle.

title: Poltergeist
filming_locations: 4267 Roxbury Street, Forest Hills, Simi Valley, California, USA
plot_simple: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

title: Girl, Interrupted
plot_simple: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the 1960s.

title: The Last of the Mohicans
plot_simple: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
filming_locations: El Camino College, Torrance, California, USA
plot_simple: Eight years on, a new terrorist leader, Bane, overwhelms Gotham's finest, and the Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
filming_locations: Coney Island, Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

title: Back to the Future Part II
plot_simple: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985... without interfering with his first trip.

title: A Scanner Darkly
also_known_as: A Scanner Darkly - Der dunkle Schirm
plot_simple: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

title: Total Recall
filming_locations: Estudios Churubusco Azteca, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico
plot_simple: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real, or does he?

title: Valkyrie
filming_locations: Barton Flats, San Bernardino Mountains, California, USA
plot_simple: Based on actual events, a plot to assassinate Hitler is unfurled during the height of WWII.

title: Meet Joe Black
filming_locations: Aldrich Mansion - 836 Warwick Neck Avenue, Warwick, Rhode Island, USA
plot_simple: A media mogul acts as a guide to Death, who takes the form of a young man to learn about life on Earth and in the process, fall in love with his guide's daughter.

title: Se7en
filming_locations: Pacific Electric Building, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

title: Halloween
filming_locations: 1000 Mission Street, South Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: A psychotic murderer institutionalized since childhood for the murder of his sister, escapes and stalks a bookish teenage girl and her friends while his doctor chases him through the streets.
